description: A man is pushing a piano up a ramp set at 45ยบ. The piano experiences no friction with the ramp. As a result, the piano accelerates up the ramp. Draw a FBD for the piano.
hints: The normal force is always perpendicular to the surface
If the object is accelerating in a given direction, it must have a net force in that direction.
The components of all forces perpendicular to the ramp should sum to zero.
